Detailed Description

A set of ink pixel in a press clip that defines a region to be further defined as a pattern for recognition.

This class stores a set of ink pixels to identify a region that will be used in a further preprocessing stage to build a pattern for feature extraction and classification. Every region has four representative pixels of ink, located on each extreme: one pixel at the top, one pixel at the bottom, one pixel on the left and one pixel on the right.

Author:
Eliezer Talón (elitalon@gmail.com)
Date:
2009-01-19
